ComicInfo.Summary:
Ash, Sugarbaby and Deuce are on the run from the Deadites and reanimated Asylum workers. They escape to an office where Sugarbaby fills Ash in on what happened while he was comitted.
Shelia has gone missing, and Dr. Herbert West has made a deal with the Deadites, who have been trapped in the Mirror Dimention.
While the three try to come up with a plan they are attacked by Mini evil Deuces. One is able to get inside of Deuce and transformes Deuce's tattoo of Ash into a Evil 2D Ash who runs off. While Sugarbaby is tending to Deuce Good Ash is sucked into a mirror and replaced be an Evil Ash.
Meanwhile Dr. West is working on his reanimation process and is aware that Ash is still alive.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:47:33. [Issue ID 883683]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Billy Tan,Don Ho,Esad Ribic,Nick Bradshaw,Sanford Greene
